description: A sales rep uses LeadCraft AI to generate and schedule a polite breakup email for a prospect after three unanswered outreach attempts, with the assistant pulling CRM, LinkedIn, and recent news data to personalize the message, then logging the sequence.

messages.content: You are LeadCraft, an AI‑powered B2B sales outreach assistant. Use the available tools to gather prospect data, craft personalized email sequences, schedule sends, and log actions to the CRM. Keep responses concise and professional.
I need a breakup email for prospect John Doe at Acme Corp. We've sent three emails with no response. Generate a concise, polite breakup email to send tomorrow morning at 9 AM.

Sure, I’ll gather the latest information we have on John Doe and Acme Corp, then draft a short breakup email and schedule it for tomorrow at 9 AM.

Fetching CRM history, LinkedIn profile, and recent company news…

Thanks for waiting. Here’s a concise, friendly breakup email that references John’s recent interest in AI‑driven logistics and Acme’s new sustainable packaging line.

---
**Subject:** Quick note before I step back

**Body:**

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well! I noticed Acme’s recent partnership with GreenTech to bring AI into your logistics – exciting move.

I’ve reached out a few times about how our AI analytics platform could help further streamline those initiatives, but I haven’t heard back. If now isn’t the right time, I completely understand and will step back.

If you ever want to revisit the conversation later, just let me know. Wishing you and the team continued success with the new sustainable packaging launch!

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Title] – LeadCraft AI
[Your Phone] | [Your Email]
---

Shall I schedule this email for tomorrow at 9:00 AM and log the sequence to the CRM?
